revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Mathematical Principles of Theology, or, the Existence of God Geometrically Demonstrated in Three Books. Wherein is Proved, The Existence of God from Eternity to Ete..."
revision.text: Possibly: Mathematical Principles of Theology, or, the Existence of God Geometrically Demonstrated in Three Books. Wherein is Proved, The Existence of God from Eternity to Eternity; his Self-existence, Independency, and Unity. That God is infinite in Wisdom, Power, Knowledge, &c. Also, That Matter is a temporary Being; that God is the Cause of its Existence, and of the Existence of all other Beings, that ever did, or can exist ; and upon God the Continuation or Termination of their Existence depends. By Richard Jack. (London : Printed for G. Hawkins at Milton's Head in Fleet-street, M DCC XLVII. [1747]) http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2405950~S1
